column1: This is a list of cities
column2: towns and villages in Andorra. The country
column4: counts 44 official statistical poblacions (i.e.: towns and villages) and other villages.

column1: 1. Les Escaldes and Engordany are former villages and nowadays the parish of Escaldes-Engordany is only one city.
